metadata.title: CVE-2024-36025 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:qla2xxx: Fix off by one in qla_edif_app_getstats() The app_reply->elem[]array is allocated earlier in this function and it has app_req.num_portselements. Thus this > comparison needs to be >= to prevent memorycorruption.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
